Name: ecommerce_platform
Title: E-Commerce Platform

Context.summary: A modern e-commerce platform that allows users to browse products, manage their shopping cart, and complete purchases securely.
Context.business: Online retail with physical product sales, targeting B2C market in DACH region
Context.domain: Retail, Logistics, Payment Processing, Customer Management
Context.technical: Cloud-native architecture with microservices, REST APIs, event-driven communication
Context.user: B2C customers (10k+ daily active users), internal admin staff (~20 users)

Initial Requirements: Users should be able to register and login with email/password
Users should be able to browse products by category
Users should be able to search for products with filters
Users should be able to add products to a shopping cart
Users should be able to checkout and pay with credit card or PayPal
Users should receive order confirmation via email
Users should be able to track their order status
Users should be able to view order history
Users should be able to manage their profile and addresses
Admins should be able to manage product inventory
Admins should be able to process and fulfill orders
Admins should be able to view sales reports and analytics
Page load time should be under 2 seconds
All sensitive data must be encrypted
System should be available 99.9% of the time

technical: REST API architecture with OpenAPI 3.0 documentation
regulatory: GDPR compliance (data privacy, right to deletion)
